text.autoconfig.configspawners.title: Configurable Spawners
text.autoconfig.configspawners.option.sp: Determines both minimum and maximum delays between spawns.
The maximum number of entities to spawn per wave.
text.autoconfig.configspawners.option.ma: The maximum number of entities that can be loaded around the spawner.
text.autoconfig.configspawners.option.re: The minimum range required for the spawner to become active.
text.autoconfig.configspawners.option.sp: The maximum range from the spawner where entities can spawn.
